name: devices_userDevicesList
description: Returns all devices associated with the given user.

$block: The information for a single iOS device

$ul: **device_name**: The device description, in the format "iPhone 7 Plus (A1784)"
**full_device_name**: A combination of the device model name and the owner name.
**imei**: The device's International Mobile Equipment Identity number. Always empty or undefined at present.
**model**: The model identifier of the device, in the format iDeviceM,N
**os_build**: The last known OS version running on the device
**os_version**: The last known OS version running on the device
**owner_id**: The user ID of the device owner.
**registered_at**: Timestamp of when the device was registered in ISO format.
**serial**: The device's serial number. Always empty or undefined at present.
**status**: The provisioning status of the device.
**udid**: The Unique Device IDentifier of the device
